Subject.Data: Thank you for registering for HackPSU!

Text.Data: Dear {first_name}, Thanks for registering! We can't wait to see you on April 9th! Keep an eye out for more information as we get closer to the event! --The HackPSU Team

Html.Data:
Dear {first_name},

Thanks for registering! We can't wait to see you on April 9th! Keep an eye out for more information as we get closer to the event!

The HackPSU Team
